trans-unit.source: Specifies that, when interpreting <xref href="System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute"></xref> declarations, the assembly should look for the indicated resources in a satellite assembly, but with the <xref:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection.BitmapSuffix*> configuration value appended to the declared file name.
trans-unit.target: 指定，解释时<xref href="System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute"></xref>声明，该程序集应查找指示资源在附属程序集，但与<xref:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection.BitmapSuffix*>配置值追加到声明的文件名。</xref:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection.BitmapSuffix*>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap suffix is appended to the file name before the extension.
trans-unit.target: 位图后缀将追加到扩展名之前的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, with a bitmap suffix of ".test.1.0", a <xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute> reference to "my.bmp" is interpreted as "my.test.1.0.bmp".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用位图后缀"。 test.1.0"即<xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>对"my.bmp"的引用将解释为"my.test.1.0.bmp"。</xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute"></xref> class.
